thread.title: Pro League: Goalkeeper's play helps Mechelen draw Anderlecht 1-1
thread.title_full: Pro League: Goalkeeper's play helps Mechelen draw Anderlecht 1-1

title: Pro League: Goalkeeper's play helps Mechelen draw Anderlecht 1-1
text:
Pro League: Goalkeeper's play helps Mechelen draw Anderlecht 1-1 
  
In the Pro League, goalkeeper Jean-Francois Gillet did more than his part to keep his Mechelen side in a match they had no business drawing against Anderlecht as he would save three penalty shots in one match from three different players. 
The first penalty comes in the sixth minute. Anderlecht are expected to go ahead, but Gillet saves the penalty from Dennis Praet to keep the match open. Not the best strike, but Gillet makes the right call on the goal line. 
Gillet is asked to do it again only six minutes later. The hosts create another spot-kick even though the foul is not that obvious. 
Former Roma striker Stefano Okaka unleashes a low shot from the spot, but Gillet denies his effort with a fine diving stop. 
Two minutes from time with Anderlecht leading 1-0, the Mechelen keeper is put to the test again. 
The home side hope to double the tally, but another incredible save keeps the visitors alive. Mechelen finally get the equalizer deep in stoppage time to escape with a draw.
